issue.title: [CF 251] Totem icons not working for mushrooms?
issue.body:
boglee said
Wednesday, June 29, 2011 12:04:02 AM (4 days ago)

Hello Cybeloras, thanks for the quick update.

I think there's something wrong with the wild mushroom icon type. It doesn't show me anything when I enable it.

Cybeloras said
Thursday, June 30, 2011 1:29:17 AM (3 days ago)
Post the export string of the icon that you are having issues with. To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click on the arrow next to the editbox labeled "The editbox of sharing...". Select the "Export to string" option, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

boglee said
Thursday, June 30, 2011 9:59:34 AM (3 days ago)
here it is:

^1^T^SType^Stotem ^STotemSlots^S0011 ^SStealable^b ^SEnabled^B ^t^N44201^^

Cybeloras said
Thursday, June 30, 2011 5:19:57 PM (2 days ago)
I haven't got a clue. My druid is only 81 so I can't test unless the PTR is up or I level my druid.

OBJECTIVE: Someone with an 85 druid, test this for me please.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #251 | Raw

comments.body:
I test this tonight. (all icon is checked always show)

1. Druid Mushroom.
icon 1 = mushroom 1
icon 2 = mushroom 2
icon 3 = mushroom 3
icon 4 = mushroom 1 2 3

2. Shaman Totem.
icon 1 = totem 1
icon 2 = totem 2
icon 3 = totem 3
icon 4 = totem 4
icon 5 = totem 1 2 3 4

3. Deathknight Ghoul.

Edited Jul 7, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Hmm, looks like totems are the only thing working. Really strange.

Edited Jul 7, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
